name: Spider Disco
description:
Once upon a time there was a little drone named Bobby.
Long story short, he now wants to learn how to move like a spider.
Go to the Spider Disco to check out why and to help him reach his dreams (without spilling too much blood)!

A game created for GryfJam 2017 by:
 Agata Nawrot - @holypangolin
 Sebastian Krzyszkowiak - @dos

Please support hungry devs, so we can keep working on our silly and/or weird games!
